text: Mugihe bashikiwe n’ijambo iryariryo ryose rijanye n’amahoro canke riteye ubwoba baca bariserura, mugabo iyo babishikiriza intumwa y’Imana canke abafise ubutegetsi buri hejuru yabo na bamwe bagenzura muribo bari kubimenya, rero iyo itaba imigisha y’Imana kuri mwebwe n’impuhwe zayo mu vy’ukuri mwari gukurikira Shetani dukuye mwo abantu bakeyi gusa muri mwebwe
